SEARCH
Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.dao

Class DesignerDaoImplTest

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.dao.DesignerDaoImplTest
@ExtendWith(org.mockito.junit.jupiter.MockitoExtension.class) public class DesignerDaoImplTest extends Object
Test class for the DesignerDaoImpl. It tests various CRUD operations related to the Designer entity.
